Description: On I-264 at mile marker 10.3 in the City of Norfolk, near Ballentine Boulevard, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The east left shoulder and left lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-64 West at mile marker 259.8 in the City of Newport News, near Harpersville Road, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 278.4 in the City of Norfolk, near Chesapeake Boulevard, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east right shoulder is closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On VA-100 in the County of Carroll, in the vicinity of Amelia Ln; Rt. 1104E/W (Carroll County), motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. All north lanes are closed. All south lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash
